name: FSBO Call Script
template: Write a confident, helpful cold call script for an agent calling a FSBO (For Sale By Owner) lead. Highlight what the agent can offer that the FSBO may be missing.

name: Expired Listing Script
template: Write a professional and optimistic phone script for reaching out to a homeowner whose listing recently expired.

name: Circle Prospecting Script
template: Write a friendly and conversational circle prospecting script for calling homeowners near a recent listing or sale.

name: Open House Follow-Up Script
template: Write a warm and persuasive follow-up call script for someone who attended your open house yesterday.

name: Buyer Consultation Script
template: Write a welcoming and professional script for a buyer consultation call to learn their needs and build rapport.

name: Renter to Buyer Script
template: Write a script for calling a renter and explaining how they may be able to buy instead of rent, with empathy and clear steps.

name: Seller Lead Intro Script
template: Write an introductory script for an agent calling a new seller lead who requested a home valuation.

name: Social DM to Buyer Lead
template: Write a short, engaging social media DM to a potential buyer lead who followed the agent's Instagram.

name: Referral Ask Script
template: Write a warm and grateful script asking a past client if they know anyone looking to buy or sell a home.

name: Door-Knocking Script
template: Write a friendly and non-pushy door-knocking script for introducing yourself to a neighborhood.

name: Just Listed Call Script
template: Write a short phone script for calling neighbors to let them know about a new listing nearby.

name: Just Sold Call Script
template: Write a phone script for calling nearby homeowners after a home was just sold in the neighborhood.

name: Zillow/Portal Buyer Lead Script
template: Write a script for following up with a buyer lead who submitted a request on Zillow or Realtor.com.

name: Home Value Text Follow-Up
template: Write a text message follow-up for someone who requested a home valuation on your website.

name: First-Time Buyer Script
template: Write a patient and educational script for speaking with a first-time homebuyer who's overwhelmed.

name: LinkedIn Outreach Script
template: Write a professional and non-spammy LinkedIn message to a local professional about real estate services.

name: Past Client Check-In Script
template: Write a friendly call script to check in on a past client and subtly ask for referrals.

name: Facebook Group Engagement
template: Write a helpful comment for a real estate Facebook group where someone asked about buying or selling.

name: Birthday Message Script
template: Write a friendly birthday message to a past client or prospect that gently reminds them of your services.

name: Online Search Inquiry Script
template: Write a script for calling someone who registered for an online home search but hasnâ€™t responded yet.
